title: Dragon Chef
description: Despite being born in a family who specialise in Sichuan cuisine, and having superior cooking talent, Mo Ting is unable to hold a knife because of his injured hand. But before he can fall down from his status, it appeared a girl who called him “Dragon Chef” and without explanation, dragged him to a celestial realm called “Ling Lang”... From then on, the ability to cross both world of delicious cooking is given to him. This addicting story released at midnight will be opened to you!
